biocontainers.name: lordec
biocontainers.summary: A hybrid error correction program for long, PacBio reads

biotools.summary: Program to correct sequencing errors in long reads from 3rd generation sequencing with high error rate, and is especially intended for PacBio reads.

bioschemas.name: LoRDEC
bioschemas.summary: Program to correct sequencing errors in long reads from 3rd generation sequencing with high error rate, and is especially intended for PacBio reads.
